title: Is a million boosters a day achievable? And other questions
article: The government wants to offer every adult in England a booster vaccine, in response to concern over the newly-identified Omicron variant. It's the latest measure being taken to combat the newly-identified Omicron variant of Covid.Here are some of your latest questions on these, and other related matters:What questions do you have about coronavirus? Do you want to ask it on BBC News? Get in touch and we may ask you to send us a video of you asking your question. In some cases, your question will be published, displaying your name, age and location as you provide it, unless you state otherwise. Your contact details will never be published. Please ensure you have read our terms & conditions and privacy policy . Use this form to ask your question:
